Hard physical activity time is a **input factor**. It means that it is one of the inputs from the user to the model.

#### Alternative names:
* Phys. Hard
* Physical hard
* Hard physical activity time
* Time doing hard intensity physical activity
* PhysicalHard

#### Uses

Hard physical activity time is used by the model in the following places

* [Coronary heart disease](/model/Ischemic)
* [Total physical activity time](/model/PhysicalTotal)

#### Guidance

The user input is a typed number and should answer the question

> How much time do you spend making high intensity physical activity in a normal week?

The unit of the input is **Minutes**, but can be changed to any of the units below

* Hours (1 Hours = 60 Minutes)

The answer has to be larger than 0 Minutes. The answer is recommended to be larger than 0 Minutes and smaller than 1000 Minutes. High physical activities make you lose your breath and includes running, playing high-intensity sports etc.


### Optimizability

Optimizability is a subjective measure that we have made to describe how easy it is to optimize a certain factor of your life. The optimizability of Hard physical activity time is 90. This means that it can be interpreted as

> *It is possible to change, and it can be changed now or very soon.*
